item.title: Development of a Settable Constant Temperature Controller
item.description: Requirements Duration: Feb. 2018 - Jun. 2018 Design and manufacture a constant temperature control system that can be set to a specific temperature: Set the temperature in grades (at least three) The range of heat is from 50 to 100 degrees, and the error should not exceed Â±5 degrees. (Score according to the accuracy) Use a cellphone to set and display the temperature. Powered by 220V AC. Achievements We shot this video to present the functions.
